mapper.select:
SELECT O.id, O.pwdErrCount, O.pwdUpdateDate, O.lastUpdateDate, O.mainPostId, O.userName, O.vcid, O.loginName, O.valid, O.createDate, O.locked, O.examinePwd, O.historyPwd, O.invalidDate, O.password, O.organizationId FROM OPER_OPERATOR O WHERE
AND O.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPER_OPERATOR ( id, pwdErrCount, pwdUpdateDate, lastUpdateDate, mainPostId, userName, vcid, loginName, valid, createDate, locked, examinePwd, historyPwd, invalidDate, password, organizationId ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{pwdErrCount}, #{pwdUpdateDate}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{mainPost.id}, #{userName}, #{vcid}, #{loginName}, #{valid}, #{createDate}, #{locked}, #{examinePwd}, #{historyPwd}, #{invalidDate}, #{password}, #{organization.id} )

INSERT INTO OPER_OPERATOR_HIS ( id, pwdErrCount, pwdUpdateDate, lastUpdateDate, mainPostId, userName, vcid, loginName, valid, createDate, locked, examinePwd, historyPwd, invalidDate, password, organizationId ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{pwdErrCount}, #{pwdUpdateDate}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{mainPost.id}, #{userName}, #{vcid}, #{loginName}, #{valid}, #{createDate}, #{locked}, #{examinePwd}, #{historyPwd}, #{invalidDate}, #{password}, #{organization.id} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM OPER_OPERATOR WHERE
AND id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE OPER_OPERATOR
pwdErrCount = #{pwdErrCount,javaType=java.lang.Integer},
pwdUpdateDate = #{pwdUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
mainPostId = #{mainPost.id,javaType=java.lang.String},
userName = #{userName,javaType=java.lang.String},
vcid = #{vcid,javaType=java.lang.String},
loginName = #{loginName,javaType=java.lang.String},
valid = #{valid,javaType=boolean},
locked = #{locked,javaType=boolean},
examinePwd = #{examinePwd,javaType=java.lang.String},
historyPwd = #{historyPwd,javaType=java.lang.String},
invalidDate = #{invalidDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
password = #{password,javaType=java.lang.String},
organizationId = #{organization.id,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE
AND id = #{id}
